Class JPGWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.lanl.adore.djatoka.io.writer.JPGWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IWriter

    public class JPGWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements IWriter
    JPG File Writer. Uses JAI to write BufferedImage as JPG
    Author:
    Ryan Chute
